EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Monday Highlights 12-4-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for Open Space, the Opening Reception and Lightning Talks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/lightning-talks]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/open-space]]> Open Space <[[https://springoneplatform.io/open-space]]> 2:00pm–5:00pm Room 3020
<[[https://springoneplatform.io#passes]]> Toys for Tots <[[https://springoneplatform.io#passes]]> Drop off: Level 1 Lobby [Mon-Thurs]
<[[https://springoneplatform.io#passes]]> Mobile App <[[https://springoneplatform.io#passes]]> Build your personal schedule
<[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> #springone <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]> Follow @s1p <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for real-time event updates
Get the Mobile App
If you haven’t already, check out the SpringOne Platform phone app <[[https://springoneplatform.io/agenda]]>! It will be your best friend throughout this conference, and will help you schedule your day’s activities.
If you have any questions, please feel free to email us at platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]> and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you, The SpringOne Platform Team
